Portal is a fun and funny puzzle game for the casual gamer. After finishing some of the puzzles, I would embarrassingly think to myself "maybe you are smart" but alas I was so wrong.

Ho iniziato questo gioco nutrendo delle aspettative non troppo altre: sapevo fosse un puzzle game valido, ma non pensavo sarebbe riuscito a prendermi fino a questo punto...
Nonostante garantisca con la storia principale solo 3 ore di gameplay (non contando alcuni extra), valgono completamente la pena di quei 8.20 a mio parere.
Un concetto di gameplay innovativo, puzzle che riescono a non essere ripetitivi nonostante utilizzino gli stessi elementi, un finale valido, seppur prevedibile, ed una bossfight finale che non necessita delle particolari doti nel combattimento per essere completata: insomma, un gioco che mette in moto la testa molto bene!

Inoltre, mi sono letteralmente innamorato del brano finale del gioco...

Why are you reading a review from 2019 when making your decision? How on earth do you not already know that you need to buy and play Portal, time now?

It's a great game. While shorter than one might expect from a AAA title, this game is bananas good. The story is hilarious enough without being overly cheesy. The gameplay starts simple and gets more complicated via slightly more challenging puzzles, as the mechanics *generally* don't change much through the game. The challenge maps are cool, I guess, but it's the story you really should be here for.

I envy those who get to play Portal for the first time, the discovery and wonder was just that good.

TL;DR: I have no earthly idea what rock you've been living under. Play Portal.

Головоломки, с применением порталов - уникальная идея, которая компания Valve взяла у одной игры, выпущенной в 2005 году - Narbacular Drop. Впоследствии головоломки с использованием порталов доведут до совершенства и Valve выпустят в 2011 году Portal 2. 
Как никак, первый портал был своего рода экспериментом и Valve хотели посмотреть на то, как игроки отреагируют, казалось бы, НЕ шутер - этом и обосновывается такая краткость и простота этой игры, и они отреагировали, отреагировали очень положительно - Valve удалось создать головоломку, которая могла бы заинтересовать даже тех, кто уже наиграл больше 1000 часов в доту или кс.
Если оценивать первый портал объективно, как самостоятельную игру, то откровенно игра очень сырая и не дотягивет до серьезных проектов, но вторая часть, выпущенная через 4 года, покажет, какими должны быть трёхмерные головоломки.

This is a great game, but you probably already know that. 

If you don't know what this game is, then either you live under a rock or you are very young (this game is pretty old now). If you honestly don't know what this game is and you enjoy puzzles, then give this game a shot. It was great when it was first released, and it is still pretty good today. If you haven't purchased the game yet, then wait for a sale (this game always drops in price during Steam sales).

portal é um excelente jogo! apesar de ser curto, zerei 2 vezes e isto só me rendeu 6 horas de gameplay, porém não se engane, mesmo ele sendo curto vale a pena cada centavo investido, a história é meio confusa mas é bem legal (Apesar que algumas coisas são interpretativas)  a jogabilidade todo mundo já conhece, mas se milagrosamente vc não sabe do que o jogo é, vou resumir rapidamente, no geral vc tem uma arma que atira 2 portais e vc tem que resolver varios puzzles pelo caminho utilizando desta arma, vale a pena e é quase obrigatório para quem se considera PC Gamer.

on jah

This game is a smart 60-minute surprise, and hilarious near the end. Still Alive, all 4 cores, and the turrets were all silly in the right ways. And the Half-Life references were clever, seeing as how this game has Half-Life 2's pulse charge and mentions the Black Mesa Research Institute. The radio could've been erased from the game entirely, it serves no purpose and is somewhat distracting. Vaporizing it only makes it worse, since now that it's gone, the test chamber can be exited. At least it's gone by test chamber 19.

A puzzle masterpiece, even though Portal 2 is the better game, Portal crunches new and innovative puzzle mechanics into an incredibly fun and easy (yet complex, in a good way) game you can play through in an hour.
